name: soundscape.social
description:
Soundscape.social is an online multiplayer virtual concert space. It allows you to traverse through 3D sonic space and interact with fellow audience members in real-time. 

Our first performance will begin at 7:30pm EST on Thursday, February 11th 2021. This performance will not end until the start of Soundscape.social's next performance, to be announced. 

You can download Soundscape.social for either Windows or Mac at the download links below. Feel free to launch the client prior to 7:30pm on February 11th to hang out in the lobby of Soundscape.social.

Tonight's Performances David Smith on Cello

David's venmo: @spicellooo (5734)

Adam Larrabee Trio

Adam's venmo: @Adam-Larrabee-3 (8773)

Jack Price on Trumpet w/Charles Lindsey on Organ

Jack's paypal: https://www.paypal.com/donate?hosted_button_id=U4BK3B3GEM6ME 

The Williamsburg Symphony Percussion Trio

Raymond Breakall's (director) venmo: @Raymond-Breakall-1 (1772)

Controls 

 WASD to Move 

  • Arrows to Look 
  • Space to Jump 
  • R to Restart 
  • T to Leave Notes Others can Read
A Collaboration with:
  • Pat Healy (design/development) 
  • Hannah Standiford (Project Organizer, PhD Student, University of Pittsburgh)
  • Classical Revolution RVA (classicalrevolutionrva.com)
Supported by Humanities Engage at the University of Pittsburgh
